question: This railway station of Andhra Pradesh will become all-women rail station.
explanation: An all-women railway station is launched at Phirangipuram, Guntur, Andhra Pradesh. The railway station on the Guntur-Narsaraopet line would be handed over to an all-women crew from the station master to the signalling staff. Only the third-of-its-kind railway station in the country after Jaipur's Gandhi Nagar and Mumbai's Matunga, the all-women station is set to create history.
